channel.title: Question about making a wilderness?
channel.description:
Where do I change what locations, or what variables allow you to attack another player?
Like, in my server, I added a wilderness area. Currently, this area only allows you to right click and hit the "attack" button, and pops up, on the bottom right corner of the screen, what level of wilderness you're in and the wilderness skull. The only problem is... It doesn't let me attack players in this area. It says something like "This player is not in the wilderness."
Any help!? Any suggestions!? I've tried:\ Don't need spoon feeding, but that'd be nice. Thank you!:)

item.title: Question about making a wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Yeah, tried both already. Couldn’t quiitte get it, idk. Maybe I’m missing something.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about making a wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

hmm you can try to find something like this

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <=3392)&& (coordX >= 2942) { return true; }

and add your wild coordinate after… or you can find the message (this player is not in the wilderness) and see around the “if” why you cant attack. this is only suggestion so i hope you will find it

Read full topic
